title: Ontology-Based e-Learning Assessment and Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ontology concepts, experience with e-learning platforms, domain expertise in science
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment for deepening professional learning in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and analyze their knowledge structures using ontology-based assessment tools.
Learners can design personalized learning paths applying ontology in e-learning environments.
Learners can quantitatively diagnose their expertise level in the science domain through project-based assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
